title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020)), following consultation
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education Act 1998 (Composition of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education Act 1998 (Composition of 

National Council for Curriculum and Assessment) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited education act 1998 (composition national council curriculum assessment) order 2023

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020)), following consultation
heading: 2. The National Council for Curriculum and Assessment shall be
text_raw:
2. The National Council for Curriculum and Assessment shall be 

composed of the persons specified in the Schedule to this Order.
text_norm: 2 national council curriculum assessment shall composed person specified schedule order

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020)), following consultation
heading: 3. The Education Act 1998 (Composition of National Council for
text_raw:
3. The Education Act 1998 (Composition of National Council for 

Curriculum and Assessment) Order 2022 (S.I. No. 206 of 2022) is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [622] 3
text_norm: 3 education act 1998 (composition national council curriculum assessment) order 2022 (s.i no 206 2022) revoked notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 15th december 2023 622 3

Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 450 of 2020)), following consultation
heading: One Chairperson.
text_raw:
22. 

One Chairperson. 

One Vice-Chairperson nominated by the Joint Managerial Body. 

One Vice-Chairperson nominated by 
Organisation. 

One nominee of the Minister for Education. 

Irish National Teachers 

One Representative of the Joint Managerial Body. 

One Representative of Education and Training Boards Ireland 
Company Limited By Guarantee. 

One Representative of Catholic Primary Schools Management 
Association. 

One Representative of the Church of Ireland Board of Education. 

One Representative of 
Management in Special Education. 

the National Association of Boards of 

Two Representatives of Association of Secondary Teachers Ireland. 

Two Representatives of Teachers’ Union of Ireland (Aontas Múinteoirí 
Éireann). 

Two Representatives of Irish National Teachers Organisation. 

One Representative of Irish Federation of University Teachers. 

One Representative of Irish Business and Employers Confederation. 

One Representative of the Irish Congress of Trade Unions. 

One Representative of The Association of Community and 
Comprehensive Schools. 

Two Representatives of National Parents Council- Primary. 

One Nominee of the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth. 

One Representative of Foras na Gaeilge. 

One Representative of the State Examinations Commission. 

One Representative of the Department of Education. 

The President of Irish Second-Level Students’ Union Company Limited 
By Guarantee. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 December, 2023. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Education. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [622]
